category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TC_ERP_dataset_types_to_transfer
preference.preference_description: Defines the dataset types to be transferred (using ERP document transfer) and the associated file format (named reference type).For example: TC_ERP_dataset_types_to_transfer= UGMASTER/Shaded-Image UGPART/Shaded-Image Text/TXT Valid Values: Accepts a single string as a value.
